responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "B4044CBE4428126091EFE699418D21E3", "More hands mean lighter work, if those hands are willing, that is. This reclamation... it ain\'t just about fighting those clanking constructs. It\'s about rebuilding. We need food, shelter, supplies. Everything starts with the basics. I can see you\'ve got some grit, but every settler needs the means to contribute, and to survive.")
name: ANV_FTUE_Dunir_GarrimHammersong_6_Response
